name: Remote Design Sprint (RDS)
description:
A few months ago our team ran our first remote design sprint in Figma, and it worked! 🚀


Inspired by the Design Sprint framework, this file is adjusted to the needs of remote design teams.


It contains team exercises, sticky notes, flowchart nodes, assets to help you create your own tasks, a few useful links...


...aand that cursor high five area, of course. 🌈


We have now released the Timer plugin to time tasks right there in the file. Find it here: https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/820311256083321341 ⏱


Let us know what you think: 🐦@killnicole, @_leotho
